cause.description:
This is a book and an Action that is taken place. It is where Adults and Teens Pray together. Instead of Praying for Teens, Pray with them! Be there Leaders and They will be True Leaders and Reflect God's Love and Jeus Christ Love in them through The Adults.
1. Pray, Pray, Pray, Pray, Pray, and Pray!
cause.name: Pray 21
